700195f-a.title: Bronx: 163rd Street (East) - Grand Concourse
700195f-a.text:
East 163rd Street, south side, east from Grand Concourse. The property on the right was formerly the Robert Simpson estate.
July 7, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

701154f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - 163rd Street (East)
701154f-a.text:
Grand Concourse, west side, north from E. 163rd street, showing new apartment house construction, at the northwest corner of E. 164th Street. On the left is the All Hallows Institute on E. 164th Street. Also shown is the north end of Joyce
Kilmer Park.
P. L. Sperr  April 10, 1941
